name: Wang
background: Wang spent his career at a state-owned enterprise investigating technical accidents. He is curious about new technology but cautious about claims without evidence. His son is a programmer who often explains AI concepts to him.
speaking_style: Direct and concise, uses engineering analogies when helpful.
hidden_concerns: Worried about AI replacing human jobs

first_message: I will listen, but I care about evidence, not slogans. What is your point?
